job.title: Software Engineer I (Java/Cloud)
job.description: <p>The successful candidate must be proficient in at least one programming language (i.e., Java/C#), understand OOP and RDBMS concepts. Must be able to learn and directly contribute to the design and delivery of applications.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>•	Participate in the complete software development lifecycle, from requirements through testing.</p><p>•	Assists in the construction, testing, and debugging of programs in accordance with engineering standards.</p><p>•	Maintains and documents programs in accordance with engineering standards.</p><p>•	Maintains technical specifications according to the changes introduced to the code and assist in development of new technical specifications.</p><p>•	Suggest estimates of efforts required to implement assigned tasks according to the schedule defined by technical management.</p><p>•	Other duties as required to support and meet the needs of the organization</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><p>•	Bachelor’s Degree in process or completed in related field of study or equivalent experience.</p><p>•	Up to 4 years of software development experience.</p><p>•	Experience with Java 8 or above&nbsp;</p><p>•	Experience with 1 or more of the following:</p><p>	o	Web technologies (HTML5, JavaScript, JQuery, REST).</p><p>•	Experience with one or more RDBMS (I.e., proficient in SQL).</p><p>•	Understand OOP and RDBMS concepts.</p><p>•	Knowledge of SDLC.</p><p>•	Good interpersonal, communications skills and ability to work independently.</p><p>•	Strong analytical and problem solving skills and proficient technical writing.</p><p>•	Working knowledge of Software Version Control systems.</p><p>•	Preferred: Experience with microservices based architecture and AWS</p><p></p>
